text: Herbert Thomas White (born June 15, 1948) is an American former professional basketball player. Due to his unique leaping ability as well as his hometown, he is nicknamed the "Elevator from Decatur". White played 38 games for the 1970-71 Atlanta Hawks. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Valdosta, Georgia
title: Herb White
